title: OT22: Flow My Tears, The Policeman Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- This is an open thread for people to post about anything they want or ask random questions.
- The author mentions a subreddit called r/slatestarcodex where people can comment on recent articles.
- The author highlights some of the comments of the week from readers.
- The author discusses an opportunity to donate to Giving What We Can for effective charity.
- The author clears his backlog of reported comments and updates the Register of Bans.

Key learnings:
- There is a subreddit where readers can comment on SSC articles.
- There are opportunities for effective charity through Giving What We Can.
- The author regularly updates the Register of Bans.

Key questions:
- None explicitly stated.
